about.text1: Hi, I'm Mohamed Ismail, an engineer and programmer passionate about development and coding. I have over 3 years of experience in this field, working on various projects from e-commerce sites to landing pages and blogs, as well as large-scale websites.
about.point1: HTML & CSS: To build attractive user interfaces.
about.point2: JavaScript: To add interactivity and intelligence to websites.
about.point3: Tailwind & Bootstrap: For fast and flexible UI design.
about.point4: Node.js & Express.js: To build scalable web applications.
about.point5: MongoDB & MySQL: For efficient database management.
about.point6: React.js & Next.js: To create modern and fast web apps.
about.point7: Sass, Firebase & Supabase: To enhance the development experience.
about.text2: I love challenges and always strive to learn new technologies. I believe programming is not just a job, but an art that requires creativity and precision. If you're looking for a committed and creative developer, feel free to reach out to me.
